com.commercetools.sunrise.framework.hooks.application

Interface PageDataReadyHook

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFacetedSearchSelectorControllerComponent, AbstractLinksControllerComponent, AbstractPaginationControllerComponent, AbstractSearchBoxControllerComponent, AbstractSortSelectorControllerComponent, AddressBookLinksControllerComponent, AssetsLinksControllerComponent, AuthenticationLinksControllerComponent, CartLinksControllerComponent, CheckoutLinksControllerComponent, CheckoutStepControllerComponent, CustomerInSessionControllerComponent, HomeLinksControllerComponent, HomeRecommendationsControllerComponent, LocalizationLinksControllerComponent, LocationSelectorControllerComponent, MiniCartControllerComponent, MyOrdersLinksControllerComponent, MyPersonalDetailsLinksControllerComponent, PageNavMenuControllerComponent, ProductFacetedSearchSelectorControllerComponent, ProductLinksControllerComponent, ProductPaginationControllerComponent, ProductRecommendationsControllerComponent, ProductSearchBoxControllerComponent, ProductSearchSortSelectorControllerComponent

    public interface PageDataReadyHook
    Hook to be executed right after the PageData has been generated and before transforming it into some readable content, such as HTML.
